decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from 03/09/2018.
Reason: To accord with the provisions of Section 92 (1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: ([Cover Letter], [Fire Safety Strategy], [Unnumbered Location Plan], [421-EXT-01], [421-EXT-02], [421-EXT-03], [421-EXT-04], [421-PROP-05], [421-PROP-06], [421-PROP-07], [421-PROP-08], Received: 09/08/2022, [Energy Statement], [SAP Calculation Printout], [Residential Energy Consumption and CO2 Analysis], [Building Regulations England Part L (BREL) Compliance Report], Received: 04/11/2022, [Cover Letter, dated: August 2024], Received: 06/09/2024, [MH/40/2024/LP/Rev 2], [MH/40/2024/A/Rev 2],  [MH/40/2024/B/Rev 2], [MH/40/2024/C/Rev 2], Received: 06/01/2025).
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.
Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) 1995 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order), no enlargement of the premises or any additional structures/buildings/enclosures within the curtilage of the site shall be carried out, other than as shown in the approved drawings, and no additional floor space shall be formed within the building(s) hereby permitted by means of internal horizontal division (new mezzanine level) without prior written approval of the local planning authority.
Reason:  To protect neighbours' living conditions and the character and appearance of the area and to prevent over-intensive use of the site. 
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no windows/dormer windows [other than those expressly authorised by this permission] shall be constructed.
Reason: In order to protect the appearance of the area and neighbours' living conditions.
Condition : 5 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9:00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority. 
Reason: In order to safeguard the amenities of adjoining residential properties and to ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the amenities of the locality.
Condition : 6 - The development shall be carried out in strict compliance with the details approved under application: P/2023/2884, approved on 21/12/2023.
Reason: In order that the Council may be satisfied as to the details of the development in the interests of the visual amenity of the area and protect living conditions, to satisfy the requirements of policies CC1 and CC2 of the adopted Local Plan.
Condition : 7 - The development shall be carried out in strict compliance with the details approved under application: P/2024/3393, approved on 28/11/2024.
Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the area.
Condition : 8 - A.	The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the approved 'Energy Statement' received: 04/11/2022. 
B.	The development shall be carried out in strict compliance with the details approved under application: P/2024/3393, approved on 28/11/2024.
Reason: To ensure that the development makes the fullest contribution to minimising carbon dioxide emissions.
Condition : 9 - The development shall be carried out in strict compliance with the details approved under application: P/2024/3393, approved on 28/11/2024.
 Reason: To ensure the cycle parking would be covered, sheltered and secure.
Condition : 10 - The development shall be carried out in strict compliance with the details approved under application: P/2023/2884, approved on 21/12/2023.
Reason: In the interest of biodiversity, sustainability, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
Condition : 11 - The development shall be carried out in strict compliance with the details approved under application: P/2024/3393, approved on 28/11/2024.
Reason: To protect the free flow and safety of traffic on nearby highways and to support sustainable transport objectives. 
Condition : 12 - The development shall be carried out in strict compliance with the details approved under application: P/2024/3393, approved on 28/11/2024.
Reason: In order to protect and conserve water supplies and resources in accordance with London Plan Policy SI5 and the London Borough of Hounslow Local Plan Policy EQ2.
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to change a bedroom to a study room and to allow for the first floor side windows to be removed of planning permission P/2022/2297 approved 15/12/2022 for the Variation of Condition 2 for planning application 00154/40/P6 dated 18/07/2018 for the demolition of existing side extension and the erection of a two-storey house, a single storey rear extension to the original house and the creation of car bays in the rear garden.
